ygData.subject: Re: Weapon question
ygData.msgSnippet: ... The cracked staff is 1h blunt.  My suggestion is to pick up a worn great staff and work on your 2h blunt and get a Giant Snake Fang (can usually pick one
ygData.messageBody:
Kakarot asked:
> What is the next logical step beyond a cracked staff? I am a lvl 3 wizard
> (just started TZ) and am only familiar with the 2H blunt. What should I
> go for after the cracked?


The cracked staff is 1h blunt. My suggestion is to pick up a worn great staff
and work on your 2h blunt and get a Giant Snake Fang (can usually pick one
up for around 1p) and work on piercing. Switch off among these various
weapons and keep all 3 of them maxxed. It will come in VERY handy later.

Iggie
level 14 Gnome Wizard
Cazic Thule
